item.description:
Dear Members,

Our next Boston Maltese Meetup will occur on Nov. 12, from 1-4 pm in Sudbury's Especially for Pets.

Our guest will be veterinarian Dr. Leonard, DVM from Slade Vet Hospital. He specializes in dentistry, acupuncture and herbal medicine, as well as conventional veterinary medicine. He will speak at 2:30 pm that day. Please let me know if you have subjects or questions you want him to answer - let me know now if possible. Also, would you like him to address Maltese dentistry? Other topics?

Kate Horgan Burke also said she could run her usual Maltese training class that day, and I'll be writing you again soon to let you know what time the class will be held.

Questions? Write to me at laptopmaltese@aol.com or call, (508) 816 3974.

Maltese best,
Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: Nov. 12 Meetup will be at Especially for Pets, Sudbury at 1 pm
